img.alt: Lake Central High School administrators Kari Regan and Erin Novak solicit the help of the Purdue Northwest mascot Leo the Lion at their recent job fair.

img.alt: Kahler kicked off Disabilities Awareness Month and the Best Buddies program coming in the fall! Thanks to our student and adult speakers who shared a powerful message on inclusion, kindness, and friendship! A special thanks to comedian and entertainer, Craig Tornquist, for serving as our master of ceremonies.

Kahler kicked off Disabilities Awareness Month and the Best Buddies program coming in the fall! Thanks to our student and adult speakers who shared a powerful message on inclusion, kindness, and friendship! A special thanks to comedian and entertainer, Craig Tornquist, for serving as our master of ceremonies.
img.p: Kahler kicked off Disabilities Awareness Month and the Best Buddies program coming in the fall! Thanks to our student and adult speakers who shared a powerful message on inclusion, kindness, and friendship! A special thanks to comedian and entertainer, Craig Tornquist, for serving as our master of ceremonies.

img.alt: Congratulations to Dylan Bielecki and Myles Kiechle. Dylan won the 5th grade Rubik's Cube Challenge and Myles was runner-up. Great job!

img.p: Congratulations to Dylan Bielecki and Myles Kiechle. Dylan won the 5th grade Rubik's Cube Challenge and Myles was runner-up. Great job!

Homan kindergarten students and first grade students doing fitness drumming as part of their music and PE classes.
